====Usage notes====
This name is used as the stereotypical Japanese family name in {{lang|ja|山田[[太郎]]}} ''Yamada Tarō'' (male) and {{lang|ja|山田[[花子]]}} ''Yamada Hanako'' (female), similar to [[John]] and [[Jane]] [[Smith]] in English.
